resourceTemplates.name: skill-detail
resourceTemplates.title: Get skill detail
resourceTemplates.description: Returns basic information about a specific skill, including name, source (custom or system), and the latest version ID. Useful to check whether a skill exists and when it was last updated.

resourceTemplates.name: skill-versions-list
resourceTemplates.title: List skill versions
resourceTemplates.description: Lists all available versions of a given skill, ordered by creation date. Ideal for retrieving version history or checking when changes were made. Use `limit` to control batch size and `page` for pagination.

resourceTemplates.name: skill-version-detail
resourceTemplates.title: Get skill version detail
resourceTemplates.description: Returns detailed information about a specific skill version, including version ID, directory path, and description. Useful for inspecting metadata or reconstructing a specific release.
